Title: Provides that certain schools shall experience no financial harm for reduced enrollment due to the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019
Summary: Provides that certain schools shall experience no financial harm for reduced enrollment or inability to operate for the 2020-2021 school year due to the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to providing that certain schools shall experience no financial harm for reduced enrollment due to the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
